General.Name: Young Fast Optoelectronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Young Fast Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of various touch panels in Taiwan, rest of Asia, and the Americas. It operates through Optoelectronic Business Group and Mechanical and Electrical Business Group segments. The company offers resistive touch panels, flat-surface touch panels, capacitive touch panels, industrial control touch panels, and touch monitors; wire and cable accessories; and after-sales services. It also provides support and services, including preliminary feasibility evaluation, market channel planning, engineering drafting, cost estimation, and mass production scheduling. The company was formerly known as The Optoelectronics Division and changed its name to Young Fast Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. in January 2000. Young Fast Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: Kuanyin Industrial Estate, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
